Class AddTagFragment

      • androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class AddTagFragment
extends androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment
implements ColorPalette.OnColorSplotchClickListener, TagChipGroup.OnTagChipCloseListener
    Small dialog fragment that facilitates adding tags to the database and to the selected items.

      • onColorSplotchClick

        public void onColorSplotchClick(int colorInt)
        Callback for the ColorPalette.OnColorSplotchClickListener Adds the provided ColorInt to the tag, then clears the Tag Field and adds the Tag to the TagChipGroup. Hides the ColorPalette.
